field.txt: You are installing 'dscsim' on Windows Vista. In the next panel you will be asked to specify the installation target directory. Due to incompatibilities between this installer and the Vista security system we strongly recommend to install 'dscsim' not in '$APPLICATIONS_DEFAULT_ROOT\$APP_NAME'. Instead please choose a directory where no security restrictions apply, e.g. somewhere in your home directory (like '$USER_HOME\$APP_NAME').
